title: Autonomous X-ray Fluorescence Mapping of Chemically Heterogeneous Systems via a Correlative Feature Detection Framework
summary: We present X-AutoMap, a modular framework for autonomous X-ray fluorescence (XRF) mapping that enables chemically informed targeting of regions of interest through a correlative feature detection strategy.
